data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Košický, Slovakia with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Košický, Slovakia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Košický, Slovakia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who are far from you in Košický. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Košický, Slovakia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Jew, Slovak-speaking people might believe through him.
Spirit, make the church in Košický, Slovakia humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Košický, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Lord, there are 697,981 people in the state of Košický who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

location.name: Košický
location.cities_list: Košice, Michalovce, Spišská Nová Ves, Trebišov, Rožňava
